内置多种页面切换效果

移动/移出效果

Move to left/ from right Move to right/ from left Move to top/ from bottom Move to bottom/ from top

淡入/淡出效果

Fade / from right Fade / from left Fade / from bottom Fade / from top Fade left / Fade right Fade right / Fade left Fade top / Fade bottom Fade bottom / Fade top

轻松效果

Move to left/ from right Move to right/ from left Move to top/ from bottom Move to bottom/ from top
